name: Submerse
description:
You are lost after exploring the haunted ship wreckage at sea.  Find your way out alive, or rest in this graveyard of  lost souls.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement

Spacebar: Toggle Light

Tips:

Your light destroys enemies and also decreases your scare meter.  

Move to charge your light battery.

Enemies spirits attempt to escape the ship, use that to your advantage.

Credits:

Brian Chin -Game Design, Sound, and Programming

Wood Texture: https://opengameart.org/content/dark-wood-textures

Rust Texture: https://opengameart.org/content/rusty-metal-floor-texture

Submarine Model: https://opengameart.org/content/superpowers-assets-3d-stuff    http://superpowers-html5.com/index.en.html
